person.persName: John R. Thomas (Marion Co. State rep)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, attorney. Marion County native. Son of Owen Davies Thomas and Emily Lindsey Thomas. Married to Susan Shuck Thomas on February 21, 1859. Married to Maria Lindsey Thomas. Graduated from St. Mary's College in Lebanon, Kentucky. Attorney in Marion County in 1860. Owned thirteen enslaved people in 1860. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Marion County from 1861 to 1867.
